snippet: Facebook is likely to be the first deal in which the firms leading an offering have prohibited employees from using a client's flagship product at work. (Or at least the first not covered by the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives.)
abstract: Facebook is likely to be the first deal in which the firms leading an offering have prohibited employees from using a client's flagship product at work. (Or at least the first not covered by the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives.)

headline.main: At Facebook's Underwriters, the Client Is Blocked for Most Workers
